Class MatrixOperations

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.game.data.MatrixOperations
public class MatrixOperations extends Object
Contains static methods for handling 2D matrices. Provides collision detection, merging, copying, and row clearing in Tetris.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ClearRow
    checkRemoving(int[][] matrix)
    Checks the game matrix for any complete rows, removes them, and drops the blocks above.

  • Method Details

    • intersect

      public static boolean intersect(int[][] matrix, int[][] brick, int x, int y)
      Checks collision between the current falling brick and game board matrix at (x, y).
      Parameters:
      matrix - the game board matrix
      brick - current falling brick's shape
      x - x position of the brick
      y - y position of the brick
      Returns:
      true if collision occurs, else false

    • copy

      public static int[][] copy(int[][] original)
      Creates a deep copy of a 2D matrix.
      Parameters:
      original - the matrix to be copied
      Returns:
      a new 2D matrix with original values

    • merge

      public static int[][] merge(int[][] filledFields, int[][] brick, int x, int y)
      Merges the currently falling brick into a copy of game board matrix.
      Parameters:
      filledFields - original game board matrix
      brick - landed brick's shape
      x - final X position of the landed brick
      y - final Y position of the landed brick
      Returns:
      game board with the new brick merged into it

    • checkRemoving

      public static ClearRow checkRemoving(int[][] matrix)
      Checks the game matrix for any complete rows, removes them, and drops the blocks above. Calculates the score bonus based on the number of clearing lines.
      Parameters:
      matrix - current game board matrix
      Returns:
      a ClearRow object containing the number of removed lines, new matrix, and score bonus

    • deepCopyList

      public static List<int[][]> deepCopyList(List<int[][]> list)
      Performs a deep copy of a list containing 2D matrices.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of 2D integer matrices
      Returns:
      a new List<int[][]> where all internal matrices are also deep copies.
